alert.note: Alert for Cass (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 27 at 3:50AM CST until January 27 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... * WHAT...Near blizzard conditions expected at times, especially in open country with falling snow. A dusting of snow accumulation. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...In Minnesota, Clay County. In North Dakota, Cass County. * WHEN...Until noon CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Slick surfaces from freezing drizzle last evening. Areas of blowing snow will significantly reduce the visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the Thursday morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at dot.nd.gov/travel and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.
